definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: measure, measurement, stature, size, garment (mostly late)—´[[מ]] Ex 26:2 + 35 t.; cstr. [[מִדַּת]] Ez Eze 40:21 + 2 t.; pl. [[מִדּוֹת]] Ez Eze 41:17 + 12 t.; [[מִדּוֹתָיו]] Ps 133:2; [[מִדּוֹתֶיהָ]] Ez Eze 48:16; —

measure, act of measurement, i.e. long measure Ez Eze 41:17 (del. Co), Eze 42:15, Eze 48:30, Eze 48:33; cf. Jos 3:4 (P), 1Ch 23:29, v. also Le 19:35 (H); once of liquid measure, fig., Job 28:25; ´[[קַו֠ה הַמּ]] Je 31:39 measuring-line; ´[[חֶבֶל מ]] Zec 2:5 (id.); ´[[קְנֵה הַמּ]] measuring-reed Ez Eze 40:3, Eze 40:5, Eze 42:16 (del. Co), v:Eze 42:16, v:Eze 42:17, v:Eze 42:18, v:Eze 42:19.

measurement, size of curtains in tabern. Ex 26:2, Ex 26:8, Ex 36:9, Ex 36:15 (all P); cf. 1Ki 6:25, 1Ki 7:37 (both ‖[[קֶחֶב]]), v:1Ki 7:9, v:1Ki 7:11, 2Ch 3:3, Ez Eze 40:10, Eze 40:10, Eze 40:21, Eze 40:22, Eze 40:24, Eze 40:28, Eze 40:29, Eze 40:32, Eze 40:33, Eze 40:35, Eze 43:13, Eze 46:22, Eze 48:16; once of time, [[מִדַּת יָמַי]] Ps 39:5; prob. also Job 11:9 (fig. of God's wisdom) where [[מִדָּהּ]] = [[מִדָּתָהּ]], cf. Sta:§ 347, c. 2; [[בֵּית מִדּוֹת]] = house of size Je 22:14; [[אִישׁ מִדָּה]] = man of size, stature, 1Ch 11:23, 1Ch 20:6; so also prob. ‖ 2Sa 21:20 (for HCT [[מדין]], Qr [[מָדוֹן]], v. [[[מַד]]]), We Dr Kit Bu; pl. Nu 13:32, Is 45:14.
measured portion, extent, stretch (of wall) Ne 3:11, Ne 3:19, Ne 3:20, Ne 3:21, Ne 3:24, Ne 3:27, Ne 3:30, cf. Ez Eze 45:3.
